issue.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `CalculatorInstanceHelper` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `#EE000000` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Graph89Theme`)

The image `appfile.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\appfile.png: 32x32 dp (48x48 px), drawable-ldpi\\appfile.png: 32x32 dp (24x24 px), drawable-mdpi\\appfile.png: 32x32 dp (32x32 px), drawable-xhdpi\\appfile.png: 24x24 dp (48x48 px)

The image `folder.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (48x48 px), drawable-ldpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (24x24 px), drawable-mdpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (32x32 px), drawable-xhdpi\\folder.png: 24x24 dp (48x48 px)

The image `romfile.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\romfile.png: 32x32 dp (48x48 px), drawable-ldpi\\romfile.png: 32x32 dp (24x24 px), drawable-mdpi\\romfile.png: 32x32 dp (32x32 px), drawable-xhdpi\\romfile.png: 24x24 dp (48x48 px)
The `appfile.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: drawable-hdpi, drawable-xhdpi
The `folder.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: drawable-hdpi, drawable-xhdpi
The `romfile.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: drawable-hdpi, drawable-xhdpi
Found bitmap drawable `res/drawable/backbutton.png` in densityless folder
Missing density variation folders in `src\\main\\res`: drawable-xxhdpi
